name: qr-menu-master
description: QR Menu Master - Unified Restaurant Ordering System

scripts.dev:customer: concurrently "cd packages/frontend && npm run dev:customer" "cd packages/backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd packages/frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd unified-server && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../admin-client && rm -rf node_modules dist
